HOW DOES PROFPICKS&SCIENCE WORK?

Our platform has been designed from the ground up to be tailored to the unique form of betting and settlement offered by the blockchain. Follow these simple steps and make profits!

WE PROVIDE UTILITY

Our dedicated customer Live Chat is available 24/7 to ensure you have seamless support whenever you need it. Whether you have questions, need assistance with your account, or require expert advice on betting strategies, our knowledgeable and friendly team is always on hand to help. We understand that your betting experience should be smooth and enjoyable, which is why we are committed to providing prompt and reliable service around the clock. No matter the time of day or night, you can count on our Live Chat support to address your concerns and enhance your overall experience.

FAQs: Find Your Solutions

Bets on future currencies prices between users CutS out bookmakers, opens a new betting experience for players.

The purest form of peer-to-peer betting. One player opens the bet and defines the odds and another player matches the bet. Players are not bound by unfavourable, centrally-defined odds.

High rollers can wager large amounts by offering bets that can be partially matched by multiple players. Similar to head-to-head bets, the odds are defined by the player who opens the bet.

Players bet on their predicted outcomes and all stakes go into a single pool. Winners share the pool. The odds are dynamic and depend on the number of participants and the amounts they wagered.

first step?
